headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Ocelot Locust
content: It’s a common predicament. You’ve driven every track-day roadster under the sun, but no matter how you thrust, switch and slam, nothing connects anymore. Well, good news: you’re about to bond again. Meet the Ocelot Locust: a slap in the face and the smoothest ride of your life, at the same time, every time, guaranteed.
